Hey, you need to wait another **{}** before doing that again.
Hrmmm, looks like you need to wait another **{}** before doing that again.
Don't you know that [patience is a virtue](http://www.patience-is-a-virtue.org/)! Wait another **{}**.

errors.andioop: Oops! Something went really wrong... Please take a screenshot and report it on the [**Support Server**]({}), thank you!
errors.private: This command can't be used in private chat channels.
errors.user_perms: Nice try stupid, but you don't have the permissions to do that!
errors.bot_perms: You didn't give me the proper permissions to do that, dummy.
errors.concurrency: Hold on! You're using this command tooooo fast!
errors.missing_arg: Looks like you're forgetting to put something in!
errors.bad_arg: Looks like you didn't type something correctly, try typing it right the first time, dum dum.
errors.not_ready: Hold on! Villager Bot is still starting up!

fun.too_long: That message would be too long to convert.

bubblewrap.invalid_size_2: The size must be between 1 and 12

minecraft.invalid_player: That player is invalid or doesn't exist.

Text in Minecraft can be formatted using different codes and
the section (`ยง`) symbol.

mod.no_perms: Nice try, but you don't have the permissions to do that!

config.invalid: That is not a valid option. (Valid options are: {})

main.title: Villager Bot Settings
guild_content:
Change the server prefix - `{0}config prefix <newprefix>`
Change if bot should respond to messages like "emeralds" - `{0}config replies <on/off>`
Changes the difficulty of the rpg - `{0}config difficulty <peaceful/easy/hard>`
Changes the language of Villager Bot - `{0}config lang <language>`

prefix.this_server: The prefix in this server is `{}`
prefix.error_1: You cannot have a prefix longer than `{}` characters.
prefix.error_2: `{}` is not allowed to be in a prefix.

diff.this_server: The server difficulty is currently set to **{}**

lang.this_server: The server language is currently set to **{}**

econ.use_a_number_stupid: You have to use a number.

math_problem.problem: Please solve this problem to continue: `{}`
math_problem.timeout: You ran out of time, what a slowpoke...

pp.bot_1: Hey dumb dumb, Villager Bot has wayy to much stuff to show here.
pp.bot_2: Hey dumb dumb, bots don't have rights and therefore can't have items or emeralds.

bal.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many emeralds to show!
bal.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.

inv.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many items to show (About 100000000000000000)
inv.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and therefore can't have emeralds or stuff.

dep.poor_loser: You don't have enough emeralds to deposit.
dep.stupid_1: You can't deposit less than one emerald block.
dep.stupid_2: You don't have enough space for that.

withd.poor_loser: You don't have enough emerald blocks to withdraw.
withd.stupid_1: You can't withdraw less than one emerald block.
withd.stupid_2: You can't withdraw more than you have.

shop.embed_footer: Use {}inventory to see what you have!

buy.poor_loser_1: You don't have enough emeralds to buy any of this item.
buy.stupid_1: You can't buy less than one of an item.
buy.stupid_2: `{}` is invalid or isn't in the Villager Shop.
buy.poor_loser_2: You don't have enough emeralds to buy `{}x` **{}**.
buy.need_total_of: You need a total of {}{} (Netherite Scrap) to buy this item.
buy.you_done_bought: You have bought {}x **{}** for {} (You have {} total)
buy.no_to_item_1: You can't buy any more of this item.
buy.no_to_item_2: For some reason, you can't buy this item.

sell.invalid_item: Either that item is invalid or you don't have it.
sell.stupid_1: You can't sell more than you have of that item.
sell.stupid_2: You can't sell less than one of an item.
sell.you_done_sold: You have sold {}x **{}** for a total of {}{}

give.bot_1: Villager Bot already has a full inventory (About 100000000000000000 unique items!)
give.bot_2: You can't give stuff bots as they don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.
give.stupid_1: You can't give stuff to yourself!
give.stupid_2: You can't give someone less than one of something.
give.stupid_3: You can't give someone more emeralds than you have.
give.stupid_4: You can't give more of an item than you have.

gamble.stupid_1: You can't gamble more emeralds than you have.
gamble.stupid_2: You have to gamble 10 or more emeralds at a time.
gamble.tie: Tie! Maybe Villager Bot will steal your emeralds anyways...

positive: A piglin tosses away {}, as only gold matters to it.
You find {} dropped by pillagers after a raid.
You find {} left by pillagers in the remnants of a destroyed village...
A villager takes pity on you and drops {} on the ground.
A traveller takes pity on you and drops {} into your hands.
You mug another beggar and get {}!
Out of annoyance, the villagers throw emeralds at you to make you go away, you picked up {}.
Eun's kindness blesses you, {} appears in your pocket.
While traveling to a village, you come across a chunk error, with exposed emeralds at the bottom. You mined up {}.
As a raid comes to an end the villagers mistake you for the hero, you receive {}.
You gave the piglin a great time. The piglin stops and thinks, and then hands you {}.
Walking towards your begging spot glistening emeralds catch your eye, you find {}.
negative: A band of piglins doesn't take your interruption lightly and steals {} from you.
You stumble accross a group of pillagers which steal {} from you.
You get hit in the head with some bread as villagers chase you out of the village. You dropped {} while you ran away.
Another begger mugs you and steals {}.
Asking a creeper didn't go so well, you lost {} from the resulting explosion.
While looking for more emeralds, you misplaced yours, losing {}.
An illusioner appears, rambling about doubling your emeralds with this once simple trick. You hand him {} and he disappears in a puff of smoke.
While begging in a village you got caught up in a raid, a ravager headbutts you across the map. You drop {} mid-flight.

places: in a chest near a monster spawner
